snippet.title: Official Mirror’s Edge Catalyst Announcement Trailer | E3 2015
snippet.description:
The official reveal trailer for Mirror’s Edge Catalyst, premiering at E3 2015 during the EA Press Conference. Experience Faith’s origin story and the future of first person action adventure games.

Learn more at www.mirrorsedge.com.

Release Date: May 24, 2016

Platforms: Xbox One, PS4, and Origin PC
